languages.text: Величественная металлическая статуя застыла в угрожающей готовности вступить в бой.
The majestic metal statue is frozen in a menacing combative pose.
languages.original_text: Величественная металлическая статуя застыла в угрожающей готовности вступить в бой.

traits.locale_text: The majestic metal statue is frozen in a menacingly combat-ready posture.
The majestic metal statue is frozen in a menacingly combat-ready posture.
The majestic metal statue is frozen in a menacing combative posture.
The majestic metal statue is frozen in a menacing combative posture.
The majestic metal statue is frozen in a menacing combative pose.
The majestic metal statue is frozen in a menacing combative pose.

languages.text: 壮大な金属像は威嚇するかのような、攻撃的な姿勢のまま停止している。
languages.original_text: The majestic metal statue is frozen in a menacing combative pose.

traits.locale_text: 壮大な金属像は威嚇するかのような、攻撃的な姿勢のまま停止している。

languages.text: 这座庄严的金属雕像一动不动，摆着气势汹汹的战斗姿势。
languages.original_text: The majestic metal statue is frozen in a menacing combative pose.

traits.locale_text: 这座庄严的金属雕像一动不动，摆着气势汹汹的战斗姿势。

languages.text: La statue de métal, dans toute sa majesté, est figée dans une posture combative.
languages.original_text: The majestic metal statue is frozen in a menacing combative pose.

traits.locale_text: La statue de métal, dans toute sa majesté, est figée dans une posture combative.

languages.text: La majestuosa estatua de metal tiene una pose combativa amenazante.
languages.original_text: The majestic metal statue is frozen in a menacing combative pose.

traits.locale_text: La majestuosa estatua de metal tiene una postura combativa amenazante.

languages.text: Die majestätische Metallstatue ist in einer bedrohlichen Kampfhaltung eingefroren.
languages.original_text: The majestic metal statue is frozen in a menacing combative pose.

traits.locale_text: Die majestätische Metallstatue ist in einer bedrohlichen Kampfhaltung eingefroren.

languages.text: Görkemli metal heykel; savaş pozisyonunda, tehditkâr bir şekilde duruyor.
languages.original_text: The majestic metal statue is frozen in a menacing combative pose.

traits.locale_text: Görkemli metal heykel bir savaş pozisyonunda, tehditkâr bir şekilde duruyor.
